name: Big album of beers
shortBrief: Photographic evidence of every beer I've tried
brief: I originally started logging the beers I had tried in facebook albums, this continues but is unwieldy to browse multiple facebook albums. BAOB scrapes all the images and data from facebook and collects it together into a single website for easy browsing. Once it has the data from facebook it pulls more info from Untappd in order to generate statistics on the beers
